product_meta.title: Hot Tools Professional Nano Ceramic Flat Iron for Smooth Styles, 1 Inch
product_meta.description:
ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Sleek and classically chic. Are you looking for the best nano ceramic flat iron? Look no further. The Hot Tools 1" Nano Ceramic Salon Flat Iron is it. Designed with high performing technology that helps protect from overheating to help keep hair integrity intact and help minimize hair damage. Designed with rounded plate edges that are MULTI-DIRECTIONAL and floating for full hair contact allow you to add variety into your flat iron straightening. If you’re feeling pin-straight tresses, you got it. If you’re wanting some beachy waves, you got it. Or maybe you want straight with a little curl at the end, you guessed it, you’ve got it. And with one-pass straightening you’ll see results even quicker. The Nano-size particles of ceramic create an ultra-smooth Micro-Shine snag-free surface allowing hair to effortlessly glide across the styling surface with less pulling, just smooth sailing leaving you with shiny results. A Rheostat control dial with variable heat settings allows you to easily control temperatures to ensure you use the perfect heat for your hair type. With a heat reach of up to 450°F, this straightener works for all hair types! Built with a ceramic heater for fast heat-up and recovery you’ll see consistent results with every use. The 8ft. professional swivel cord provides free range of movement and a one-year warrants provides added value. TOP FEATURES: 1.) Rheostat control dial with variable heat settings up to 450°F for optimal results on a variety of hair types and textures. 2.) Nano Ceramic Micro-Shine plates provides a superior styling surface to help create smooth styles and reduce frizz. 3.) Ceramic heater helps provide a fast heat-up and recovery. 4.) An 8ft. professional swivel cord provides free range of movement.

BRAND STORY
Hot Tools Professional is a reliable brand that’s been winning awards for over 25 years, creating superior, stylist preferred styling tools that consist of innovation in every way.
feature_bullets: Nano ceramic ultra-smooth floating plates for shiny, beautiful hair
Rheostat control dial heats up to 450 F with separate on/off switch
8ft swivel cord with hanging ring for tangle-free operation
